user.title: The Windcentrale Set Up
user.description:
Set up the Windcentrale integration. https://www.windcentrale.nl

If you need help with the configuration have a look over here: https://github.com/jobvk/Home-Assistant-Windcentrale

Fill in the amount of windshares you own off the specific wind turbine:

error.bad_credentials: Incorrect Credentials: Verify your e-mail address and password and try again.

abort.already_configured: The windcentrale has already been configured.

init.title: The Windcentrale Options
init.description:
Options for the Windcentrale integration. https://www.windcentrale.nl

If you need help with the configuration, have a look over here: https://github.com/jobvk/Home-Assistant-Windcentrale

data.live: Enable live data sensors of the wind tubine(s)
data.live_interval: Update frequency for the live sensors(Minimum 20 sec - Maximum 300 sec)
data.production: Enable the production history sensors of the wind turbine(s)
data.production_interval: Update the frequency for the production sensors(Minimum 1 min - Maximum 60 min)
data.news: Enable news for the wind turbine(s)
data.news_filter: Filter for the news of the wind turbines(s)
data.news_interval: Update frequency for the news sensor(Minimum 1 min - Maximum 60 min)
data.show_on_map: Show the wind tubine(s) on the map
